CustomField.description: Formula field used to dynamically concatenate the Name, Entity Type Descriptor, and DBA of the Account associated with a Case Role.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT (ISBLANK(Entity__r.PersonContact.Law_Firm__c)), Entity__r.PersonContact.Law_Firm__r.Name + ", Attn:" + Entity__r.Name_UsedInTemplates__c, Entity__r.Name_UsedInTemplates__c + IF(ISBLANK (Entity__r.Entity_Type_Other__c), ", " + TEXT( Entity__r.Legal_Entity_Descriptor__c ),", " + Entity__r.Entity_Type_Other__c) + IF (ISBLANK ( Location__r.DBA__c ), "", " dba " + Location__r.DBA__c ) + IF (ISBLANK(Entity__r.PersonContact.AKA_Alias_or_other_special_circumstance__c), "", ", a.k.a. " + Entity__r.PersonContact.AKA_Alias_or_other_special_circumstance__c))
CustomField.label: Case Role Entity Full Output
